text: Hugo the Hippo () is a 1975 Hungarian animated family drama movie directed by Józzef Gémes and starring Ferenc Bessenyei, Burl Ives, Robert Morley, Paul Lynde, László Márkus. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1975 drama movies Category:1970s family movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Movies directed by Józzef Gémes Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Hugo, a vizilo
